General.Name: Jade Leader Corp
General.Description: Jade Leader Corp. explores and develops mineral properties in Canada and the United States. It holds interest in the Wyoming Jade Fields covering an area of approximately 1,800 acres located in Wyoming; and the DJ Jade project that covers an area of approximately 140 hectares located in Washington State. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 808-4th Avenue S.W., Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 3E8

0.Name: Mr. Jean Pierre Jutras B.Sc., B.Sc. Hons, P.Geo., P.Geol.
